title: Development of a National Strategy for Skills Development in the Audio-visual Industry (BAI - Broadcasting ...
text: ( Source : BAI - Broadcasting Authority of Ireland ) The Broadcasting Authority of Ireland and Bord Scannán na hÉireann / the Irish Film Board are pleased to announce the appointment of Crowe Horwath as consultants to draw up a new Strategy
